description: Nexagate Sdn Bhd offers Herr Pinn an internship as a Managed Security Intern, commencing on March 18, 2024, and concluding on August 30, 2024. The internship will involve responsibilities such as demonstrating expertise in network traffic analysis, proficiency in security-related technologies, and conducting forensic analysis of digital information. The offer includes a monthly salary of RM 800.00 and 5 days of paid leave. The company also outlines a code of conduct and non-disclosure agreement, along with details regarding resignation and termination procedures.
